name: Duck Is Stuck
description:
A puzzle game about a duck trying to get to his nest.

this game was made for the Mini Jam 101:Limit game jam with the limitation limit and the theme control the environment 

You can push trees around but not 2 at the time. And the goal is to get to the nest

Controls:

     Move - WASD or Arrow keys

     Exit to menu - Esc

     Restart - R

     Next level - Enter/Click

Credits:

This game was made by Daandev1
